subject: Big corporations are using Rank Math - and you should too!
preview: Hey Wp - hope you're well! We've observed that since Google's May update, the big enterprises have seen a boost in their traffic. A large part of this success is due to the tools they are using - tool

full_threads.body:
Hey Wp - hope you're well!

We've observed that since Google's May update, the big enterprises have seen a boost in their traffic. A large part of this success is due to the tools they are using - tools that offer more than just great content.

This is where Rank Math PRO shines. We're proud that even big corporations like WebMD, Twitch, and H&M have opted for Rank Math after dropping their old SEO plugins and tools. Rank Math PRO offers Enterprise-level tools in a small package.

To help you on your SEO journey, we are offering a SPECIAL DEAL for a LIMITED TIME!

>> Click HERE to Take Rank Math PRO for a SPIN!
For a limited time, we are offering double the benefits for the same discounted price.
(comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee)

Here's what Rank Math PRO offers that help you beat your competition out of water:

  • Content AI - Helps in generating content that Ranks
  • Schema Generator - Simply put the URL of your competitor or a big site and generate complex Schema in a jiffy without writing anything manually
  • Rank Tracker& Advanced Google Analytics - Instead of paying 100s of dollars every month to track the performance of your keywords, Rank Math PRO offers you to track the changes in the position of the keywords and stay on top of the game
  • Index Statuses - Getting your content Indexed could never be easier than with Rank Math and also tracking the statuses on Google with no coding at all
  • Google Trends, Video Sitemap, News Sitemap,&hellip - Rank Math PRO is a one-window solution for all your SEO needs
  • Video SEO, WooCommerce SEO, Image SEO, Local SEO - You name it, and Rank Math takes care of all such optimizations automatically
  • Email Reports - Get a birds-eye-view of how your website is performing by getting the reports in your inbox
  • 24x7 Premium Support - We take pride in providing one of the best support systems for any SEO plugin out there
  • Money-Back-Guarantee - We are so sure of our product and services that we offer a No-questions-asked 30-day money-back guarantee. Try our product, support & services and if you are unsure, simply drop an email, and we will refund immediately without asking any questions whatsoever.

>> Get Rank Math PRO right now & enjoy all the premium features
(comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee)

Before I conclude, we just released a brand new update to Rank Math with several new features added that you should take a spin on!

And if you've absolutely any questions about upgrading or updating Rank Math, hit reply, and I'll get back to you right away.

Cheers,

Bhanu Ahluwalia
(Co-Founder, Rank Math SEO Plugin)

Don't want to receive these emails or any future plugin updates? Unsubscribe here
Rank Math Ventures LLP, EC-320, G-8, Area Rajouri Garden, Maya Enclave, Hari Nagar, New Delhi, IN - 110064
